title: Virtual Assistant & Creative Support Specialist
job_overview:
Part-Time to Full-Time | Remote | Flexible Hours
Are you a reliable, creative, and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant looking for a stable, long-term position with a mission-driven business? I help women over 50 lose weight, lower blood sugar, and improve their health using simple, natural strategies that align with biblical principles.
This is a multifaceted role that combines creative work (graphics, social media, and presentations) with administrative and customer support tasks. If you enjoy variety, are a fast learner, and love supporting others, this could be a great fit for you.

Responsibilities
Design and Presentation Creation
Create high-quality graphics using Canva for social media, courses, and handouts
Design PowerPoint or Canva slide decks for webinars, masterclasses, and speaking presentations
Social Media Support
Schedule and post content on Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube
Monitor comments and messages, and engage with members inside private Facebook groups
Track and report social media analytics weekly
Administrative and Project Support
Use Trello to manage tasks and timelines
Create and update standard operating procedures (SOPs) using checklists and Loom or other video tools
Help set up and support live webinars and online events
Manage inbox and help with scheduling, when needed
Customer Support and Client Onboarding
Respond to client inquiries in a friendly and timely manner
Onboard new clients into courses and programs by granting access and offering support
Assist with troubleshooting login or access issues

Requirements
1 to 2 years of experience as a Virtual Assistant or in a similar support role
Proficiency in Canva, Trello, PowerPoint or Google Slides, and major social media platforms
Strong English communication skills, both written and spoken
Highly organized and detail-oriented
Self-motivated and able to work independently without constant supervision
Comfortable learning new tools and documenting workflows
Stable internet connection with backup options for power or connectivity

Preferred (Not Required)
Basic video editing skills for reels, shorts, or screen recordings
Experience with GoHighLevel
Familiarity with the health coaching or faith-based personal development space

Work Schedule and Compensation
10 to 20 hours per week to start
Flexible schedule with occasional availability needed for live events or check-ins
Hourly rate: $3 to $5 USD depending on experience
Long-term opportunity with potential to grow into a full-time
